Row.Text: Our people are now singing songs about yeast-based spreads and demanding I step down in favour of a high-school dropout! I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

The people have apparently decided you're too "tired" to continue leading our country, and want you to step down in favour of your deputy, Paul Keating. While this surely isn't ideal for you, his skill in economics COULD be very useful...[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Australia [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have entered the Modern Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Merchant Specialists generate an additional +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Merchant appears near the Capital

Our old Parliament was meant to be temporary, and now it's running out of space for our national debates! We should build a new one as soon as possible![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Merchant Specialists generate an additional +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A Great Merchant appears near the Capital
